dmca.title: DMCA Complaint - www.copycat-recipe.net
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Top Secret Recipes [mailto:admin@topsecretrecipes.com] 
Sent: Monday, August 01, 2005 4:19 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint - www.copycat-recipe.net
Importance: High


          
To Whom It May Concern;
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP Owner") (
<http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp>
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp). I have good faith belief
that the materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner,
it's agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the IP Owner's rights.  I
believe that cashed copies of the web site  <http://www.copycat-recipes.net>
http://www.copycat-recipes.net are hosted on one or more of your server(s)
at   <http://www.theplanet.com/> http://www.theplanet.com/ 

Infringing material:
 
 <http://www.copycat-recipes.net/> http://www.copycat-recipes.net is
primarily made up of recipes from one or more of the copyrighted works
listed below. This material has been presented on this web page without
permission.
 
Infringed work or right includes any of Todd Wilbur's original recipes,
either from his eight books in publication: 
 
Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1993)
More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1994)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1997)
Top Secret Recipes Lite (Penguin/Putnam 1998)
Low Fat Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2000)
TSR Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
Even More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
The Best of Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2003)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes II - Registration Number TXu1-198-872
 <http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp>
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
 <http://www.topsecretrecipes.com> http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Pamela Ellis
Vice President; Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
10401 Orkiney Drive
Las Vegas, NV 89144
Email:  <mailto:admin@topsecretrecipes.com> admin@topsecretrecipes.com
Telephone: 702-254-8125
Fax: 702-254-8660

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing. Given that  <http://www.copycat-recipes.net>
http://www.copycat-recipes.net
is primarily composed, of a large number of pages that contain infringing
material, if possible please disable access to all cached copies of
<http://www.copycat-recipes.net/> http://www.copycat-recipes.net
 
Truthfully,
 
Pamela Ellis
 <mailto:admin@topsecretrecipes.com> admin@topsecretrecipes.com
Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
 <http://www.topsecretrecipes.com> http://www.topsecretrecipes.com

 

 

To be effective, a Notification of Claimed Infringement must meet the
following requirements: 

*        It must be a written communication; 

*        It must be sent to the designated agent identified above; 

*        It must include the following: 



1.        A physical or electronic signature of a person ("Complaining Party")
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
claimed to be infringed; 

2.        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at
that site; 

3.        Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or
to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access
to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
the service provider to locate the material; 

4.        Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted; 

5.        A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and 

6.        A statement that the information in the notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is authorized to
act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed. 

When a Complaining Party provides a Notification of Claimed Infringement in
compliance with the above rules, the Service Provider will do the following:


*        Expeditiously remove or disable access to the material that is
claimed to be infringing; and 

*        Take reasonable steps to notify the alleged infringer ("Subscriber")
of the infringement claim(s) and that the material claimed to be infringing
has been removed or that access to the material has be disabled; 

Upon receipt of notice from the Service Provider that a claim of
infringement has been made and that the material has been removed or that
access to it has been disabled, the Subscriber may provide a Counter
Notification.
